column4: im trying to use skype, but the only devices that show in my 'devices' are 'PulseAudioServer' i made a test call, and it doesn't work. Thanks in advance for any help
check the obvious that the mic isn't muted or something (I installed gnome alsa mixer to check)
i have checked in alsamixer already
the only available device is pulseaudio server
thats the same for me, but Skype works fine
often I find the volume quite low though
nothing is muted
if you go to system->prefs->sound and speak, do you see the input line moving in relation to your voice level ?
(on the input tab I mean)
no
so I think that needs fixing before skype will work
i dont know how to fix it
what options are there at the bottom for your sound input devices ?
internal audio digital stereo (iec958)
just that
and mic level is up and not muted in alsa-mixer I assume. Is there anything you have tested with the mic to be sure it works connected ?
everything is up in alsamixer
sure the mic is on? :)
i've only tested the mic in skype, what you told me to do here, os x, and windows. they work in os x and windows
im sure it is on
is there anything i can take a screen-shot of to show you?
in alsa-mixer, have you gone to edit->prefs and checked right device is showing ?
no
ok, i did that
